short_summary: Applied Suicide Intervention Skills Training (ASIST) is required.
description: The VAC requires a contractor to provide certified ASIST instructors to teach a 2-day suicide prevention training course on an ",on and when requested" basis.
full_summary:
=================================

### Tender Announcement for Applied Suicide Intervention Skills Training (ASIST)

**Reference Number:** CB-123-16430721

**Amendment Number:** 5

**Solicitation Number:** 3000767786

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding

**Publication Date:** October 25, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** November 22, 2023, 13:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Veterans Affairs Canada

**Contracting Entity Address:**
161 Grafton Street
Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island
C1A 1L1
Canada

**Contact Information:**
Joanne Jay
Email: [joanne.jay@veterans.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.jay@veterans.gc.ca)
Phone: (782) 377-0006

**Contract Overview:**
The Department of Veterans Affairs (VAC) is seeking a contractor to provide certified Applied Suicide Intervention Skills Training (ASIST) instructors to deliver in-person training courses. The training will take place in various locations, as requested, and will require two certified instructors per session.

**Service Requirements:**

* Provide two certified ASIST instructors per training session
* Deliver two-day, in-person ASIST training courses as required
* Conduct training in various locations across Canada

**Selection Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Attachments:**

[Request for Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23122/3000767786-rfp-applied-suicide-intervention-skills-training-%28asist-_0.pdf)
[Attachment in French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/23122/3000767786_ddp_formation-appliquee-en-techniques-dintervention-face-au-suicide-%28fatis.pdf)

Note: I removed the status because it seems expired and not relevant to most people currently. I also created a contract overview to make it easy to read and understand the requirements. I removed the end user information since it was just a reference. The rest of it remains the same. Also, the bid documents were available under the attachments section. Let me know if you would like me to make any further changes.  Remember to stay within the 400 words.
